The following files need to be present here. Be sure Assembly-CSharp.dll is from a copy of the game that hasn't had MTG installed.

Assembly-CSharp.Base.mm.dll
Assembly-CSharp.dll
Assembly-CSharp-firstpass.dll
MonoMod.RuntimeDetour.dll
MonoMod.Utils.dll
PlayMaker.dll
UnityEngine.CoreModule.Base.dll
UnityEngine.dll
UnityEngine.ImageConversionModule.dll
UnityEngine.ParticleSystemModule.dll
UnityEngine.Physics2DModule.dll
UnityEngine.PhysicsModule.dll
